allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Initial MVP of Unsan Academy

- Django REST Framework backend with MechanicProfile, JobCard, Task models
- React + Vite + Tailwind frontend with clean UI
- Penta-Stat radar chart \(Tech, Hand, Speed, Art, Biz\)
- Hierarchical Skill Tree with 4 tracks + Hybrid legends
- SOP mission system with stat rewards
- Tier progression system \(Unranked → Diamond\)
- Landing page for academy introduction

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash("C:/Program Files/GitHub CLI/gh.exe" repo create unsan_academy --public --source=. --remote=origin --push --description "Gamified career management platform for auto mechanics")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Major UI overhaul - Nomad Coders style dark theme

- Add 88 job database with salary, hiring companies, career paths
- Implement Job Library with search, filters, and live job postings
- Apply dark theme with pop accent colors \(yellow, cyan, pink\)
- Add live ticker, track cards, and challenge sections
- Include fake live data \(unlock toasts, active mechanics count\)
- Refactor Landing page with gamified design
- Update all pages to dark mode

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Replace custom Tailwind colors with standard colors

Custom color classes \(bg-dark-*, text-pop-*, etc.\) were not being generated
properly despite correct tailwind.config.js configuration. Switched all
components to use standard Tailwind slate/yellow/green/etc. colors for
reliable rendering.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add Logic-Based Salary Simulator with Bell Curve distribution

- Add SalaryInfo type to types/index.ts
- Create salaryCalculator.ts with logarithmic growth and Gaussian distribution
- Create SalaryChart component using Recharts \(Area + Bar composed chart\)
- Integrate salary simulator into JobDetailModal
- Features: adjustable years slider, stat customization, percentile ranking

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add prerequisiteJobs to all 88 jobs - Skill Tree graph structure

Complete skill tree connections for career progression:

## Maintenance Tree \(Group A\)
- Root: 경정비 \(maint_01\)
- Branches: 타이어→얼라인먼트→서스펜션, 변속기→엔진오버홀
- Advanced: 진단가→하이브리드→EV 배터리

## Aesthetic Tree \(Group B/C\)
- Root: 디테일링 \(body_01\)
- Film Path: 틴터→랩핑→PPF
- Body Path: 도장→덴트\(PDR\), 조색사

## EV/Future Tree \(Group D\)
- Entry: 하이브리드→EV배터리 \(transition from maintenance\)
- Branches: 모터수리, 폐배터리, ADAS→자율주행센서

## Management Tree \(Group E\)
- Root: 서비스어드바이저→점장→창업컨설턴트
- Finance: 리스에이전트→구독매니저

## Niche & NextGen \(Group F/G\)
- Cross-group paths to advanced specializations
- Final boss: 운산 아카데미 트레이너 \(requires multiple paths\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
